SALES SUPERVISOR - SALES EFFECTIVENESS

SUMMARY

Experienced sales supervisor and recognized training facilitator with over 25 years of sales experience in the Utility Industry.
Proven track record of implementing successful sales programs to exceed Team and Company goals. ​ ​
Highlights
Microsoft Dynamics CRM subject matter expert Chosen to represent Sales as  CRM Product Owner for 2018 product upgrade  Certified facilitator - 7 Habits of Highly Effective People LEED certified (one of three at the time with PNG) Commercial Sales Person of the Year 2008 (Piedmont Natural Gas) Excellent communication skills
Self-Motivated and highly driven to succeed GSA committee member and facilitator for final product implementation Established track record of exceptional sales results Experienced Project Management utilizing sales systems Agile Trained

Maintained, updated and developed policies and procedures for the Sales team Converted all forms, letters and agreements to electronic versions Developed Sales training materials for the sales reps, supervisors and managers As the CRM expert, I work closely with the newly created IT group to ensure the health of the product Currently working on an Integration project as the Product Owner of CRM

<JD_START>
Job Title: Operations Specialist for Paid Marketing/E-commerce and handle Bookkeeping

Location: Los Angeles Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Company DescriptionPerfeos is a rapidly growing e-commerce business. As we continue to expand our operations, we are seeking a talented and experienced individual who can serve as both an Operations Specialist for Paid Marketing/E-commerce and handle Bookkeeping responsibilities to join our team.
Role DescriptionWe are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Operations Specialist with a strong background in Paid Marketing and E-commerce, coupled with proficient bookkeeping skills to join our team. In this full-time hybrid role based in Miami, FL, you will be responsible for managing day-to-day operations related to paid marketing campaigns, overseeing financial transactions, and providing strategic financial insights for our marketing initiatives. You will collaborate closely with the marketing team and cross-functional stakeholders to drive financial excellence and ensure operational efficiency. Remote work options are available.
QualificationsBachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related fieldProven experience in accounting and financial management, preferably in a marketing organizationStrong knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, and forecastingProficiency in financial software and toolsPrepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements and reports for management reviewAbility to effectively communicate financial information to non-financial stakeholdersExperience with marketing operations and understanding of key metricsAbility to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environmentCertified Public Accountant (CPA) designation is a plusCollaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement strategies to drive customer acquisition and retentionMonitor and optimize marketing spend to maximize ROI and achieve business objectivesStay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in both finance and marketing to identify opportunities for improvementMinimum of 5 years of experience in accounting or finance roles, preferably in e-commerce or retail industryProficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero) and marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager)
How to Apply:Interested candidates should submit a resume and cover letter outlining their qualifications and relevant experience to shiela.thunderlabs@gmail.com. Please include "Accountant/Finance Manager with Marketing Operations Application" in the subject line. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until April 8, 2024, so early submission is encouraged.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
